name: Sea To Summit Pocket Umbrella
description: With such a small and light design, this umbrella is likely to become an everyday piece. keep it in you daypack, in your suitcase or the car for unexpected storms. With a canopy diameter of 82cm, the protection-to-weight ratio is hard to beat.Tiny packed size. Collapses to only 16cm.Lightweight at 150g.Reverse 4-section telescoping shaft extends to 49cm.Canopy diameter is 82cm.
